column4: i am aware of the alternate cd, but by any method is it possible to mount a RAID volume and install using ubiquity-installer?  would modprobing mdadm be enough for /dev/md0 to show up *somewhere*?
what happens when you install both ubuntu and kubuntu-desktop?  does it give you a choice via gdm?
you select kde/gnome through the session menu on gdm/kdm
